Join our R for Econometrics Study Group! Dive into practical applications of R in economic analysis. This group welcomes enthusiasts, from beginners to experienced users, to explore R's powerful statistical and data visualization capabilities. Through collaborative sessions, we'll enhance econometric skills, discuss real-world applications, and share valuable resources. Whether you're into regression analysis, time-series modeling, or data visualization, this group offers a supportive environment to boost your proficiency in R for econometrics. Let's unravel the insights hidden in data together! The book for the group is [Introduction to Econometrics with R](https://www.econometrics-with-r.org/)
